description:
The relentless search for beautiful men takes me back to Texas, one of my favorite stomping grounds. I was on a business trip and met up with a few guys including Rick. I just drooled over this guy when I first met him. It will never cease to amaze me how some guys have it all... handsome face, chiseled body, great nuts, big dick.
I really love Texas boys because they're so friendly. And what is it with all the big cocks in Texas?
You might recognize the background from some of my earlier films, I'm a creature of habit and it just happens to be one of my favorite hotels.
title: Rick
